value:
$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Ah! Welcome back, you two.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Phew! That was quite the workout...
The water was amazing, Lyon. I wish
you would have joined us!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Swim22,Face|We saw some colorful fish. They'd
make good specimens for further
observation and study.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_22_Tor_FF_Pair,Face|Well, well, if isn't the god of ice.
Who could have predicted we might
run into you again.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Was I unclear when I expressed
my wish to be left alone?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_22_Tor_FF_Pair,Face|Well, you see, we bought ourselves
frozen treats and the vendor offered
us a few extra—at no extra cost!$k$pPlease, do take one, won't you?
Consider it our way of apologizing
for invading your time alone.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|I need nothing from you. Not your
apologies, frozen treats, or anything
else for that matter.$k$pNevertheless...I will not turn
one down.$k$p...Hm. Not bad...$k$pI will accept the rest now. You said
they were extra, no? I will take them.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|You had something you wanted
to show me, Lyon?$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Yes. It's nothing particularly special,
but... Well, see for yourself.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Oh! That sandcastle is amazing!
Did you sculpt it all yourself?$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|I had to find some way to keep
myself occupied while you and
Seth were out swimming...$k$pI know it's only sand, but I put
effort into the design... Does it
remind you of anything?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Aha! It's the castle in Renais!
Which must mean those seashells
there are...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|The one with the sharper edge
is Ephraim. And the one with the
smoother shape is, well...you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Hmm... I can see it! You have
some imagination, Lyon!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|And that thick bit of shell right
there is Seth, watching over
you both.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|It's almost like I'm there! You have
a wonderful eye for detail, Lyon.$k$pThere is one thing you forgot,
however... Hmm... Yes, I think
this shell will do nicely.$k$pBut where to— I know. It will go
here, between me and Ephraim...
There we are.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|What's this you're adding?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|You, of course! The three of us
have been practically inseparable
since childhood, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Oh, I... Of course. Thank you. I think
that will complete it. If only we—
er, it could stay like this forever...$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Wait... Do you hear that?$k$pLook out! A huge wave is coming in!
Quick! We have to—$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|It's...too late. The castle is gone...$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|I'm so sorry, Lyon! You put so much
work into that... I feel bad you had
to watch it get washed away...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|It's...all right. The tide would have
come for it eventually. There's no
way around that.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|I wonder if we could have built
a barrier to keep it safe longer,
if only another a day or two...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|I'm just glad that you were able
to see it and enjoy it with me.
That makes it all worth it.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|I'm glad too. I won't soon forget
it either, Lyon.$k$pI can't wait to tell Ephraim about it
and everything else I've seen here
once I get back home.$k$pHe will be incredibly jealous that
you were able to build such a
fantastic sandcastle!$k$p$WmMPID_水着リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Swim22,Face|Ephraim? Jealous of me? Hah...
There's one thing I hadn't ever
imagined.$k$p$Sbs150|
